Text.Page:
I always get the worst scouting missions.

Now Georrif wants me to go up into those frozen frigates, but the way is crawling with {@LinkCreature:31#3#frigid ossugons} and {@LinkCreature:31#7#deathfrost cavaliers}! I'll never make it back alive!

, for the safety of your fellow federation soldiers...ummm, me...could you clear the way?

But now that the area is really cleared, there's no thrill anymore.

What am I saying? Thank you so much. You're a life saver!
